DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy and safety of co-administrated temisartan/amlodipine and rosuvastatin in subjects with dyslipidemia with hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Telmisartan/Amlodipine/Rosuvastatin
DOC.criteria: Dyslipidemia with hypertesion msSBP < 180 mmHg msDBP < 110 mmHg LDLC ≤ 250 mg/dL Triglycerides < 400 mg/dL At Visit 3, BP difference SBP ≥20mmHg or DBP ≥10mmHg CK normal range ≥ 2 times Uncontrolled primary hypothyroidism(TSH normal range ≥ 1.5 times) AST or ALT ≥ 2 times Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus (HbA1c≥9%) CLcr < 30 mL/min/1.73m^2 K > 5.5 mEq/L Other exclusion applied
